means: 使（人）失望( disappoint的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: When things go wrong, all of us naturally feel disappointed and frustrated.
sentence.Network_cn: 出问题时，我们大家自然都感到失望和沮丧。

sentence.Network_en: She will be disappointed if her feelings are not returned.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她的感情得不到回报，她会感到非常失望。

sentence.Network_en: I was disappointed whenever the cook found fault with my work.
sentence.Network_cn: 每当厨师挑剔我干的活儿时，我都非常沮丧。

大学英语四级词汇短语总归纳-自考-搜狐博客 ... clumsy at 做…很笨拙 disappointed at 对…失望 excellent at 极其擅长于.

entry.tran: (对某事)失望的，沮丧的，失意的
entry.def: If you are disappointed, you are rather sad because something has not happened or because something is not as good as you had hoped.

example.ex: Castle-hunters won't be disappointed with the Isle of Man...
example.tran: 马恩岛不会让城堡探寻者失望的。

example.ex: I was disappointed that Kluge was not there...
example.tran: 克卢格不在那儿，我很失望。

entry.def: If you are disappointed in someone, you are rather sad because they have not behaved as well as you expected them to.

example.ex: You should have accepted that. I'm disappointed in you.
example.tran: 你本应该接受那个的，我对你很失望。

sentences.sentence: "many frustrated poets end as pipe-smoking teachers"

auth_sentence.content: He has never disappointed and long may it last.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has never disappointed and long may it last.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has never disappointed and long may it last.

auth_sentence.content: Someone justify to me why we should be disappointed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Someone justify to me why we should be disappointed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Someone justify to me why we should be disappointed.

auth_sentence.content: I was disappointed with some points of this article.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was disappointed with some points of this article.

Sentence.sentence: We feel disappointed in ourselves and ashamed.

sentences.en: He was disappointed at the result.
sentences.cn: 他对这样的结果感到失望。

sentences.en: I was completely disappointed to hear that.
sentences.cn: 听到那个消息后我彻底失望了。

sentences.en: We were disappointed that they could not learn the lesson of history.
sentences.cn: 他们没能吸取历史的教训, 使我们感到很失望。
